text: Adubu matam kharatagi oina swargadutsingdagi khara hanthahanbiraba Jisubu eikhoina ujei, maram aduna Tengban Mapugi thoujalgi mapanna mi pumnamakkidamak Ibungo mahakna sibinanabani. Mahakna sibikhibagi awaba adu khaangbikhiba adugi maramna houjikti mahakpu matik mangal amasung ikai khumnabagi luhup uppire.
